about_the_game:
Destruction All Stars is a collection of 10 minigames with a lot of variety and bizarre premises!

In this game, you play as a boy who lives in a very peculiar city, which has arcade machines distributed all over it. Every time you complete one of the games from those arcades, their characters come alive and start to inhabit the city, letting you interact with them and unlock funny interactions between themselves.

Some of the minigames you can find in the arcades are:

Totally Functional Game

A puzzle platformer in which you must fix its bugs while you play.

Dungeons and Chatlogs

In this visual novel style game, you are the leader of a Dungeons and Dragons party, but your teammates argue with each other too much, so you must calm them down before the dungeon eats all of you alive.

The Funeral of Wang Paseca the Clown

Your friend just died, and at his funeral you find out that he was living a secret life as a clown, so the funeral gets filled with all kinds of circus characters. You must escape the top-down view labirynth and avoid making eye contact with the clowns, before you burst a loud laugh and look like a complete bozo.

Complete all the games to give life to this city full of bizarre characters!

name: Destruction All Stars
short_description: A collection of minigames with bizarre premises. In one moment you may find yourself trying not to laugh at a funeral full of clowns, and in the next you must stop your Dungeons and Dragons party from arguing with each other. The characters from those games inhabit your city once you clear them!
